# Ignored #ignored-tag

ignored

# Note 1 #card #tag-in-header-1 #tag-in-header-2

n1 text #not-tag-inline

## n1 h2

n1 text

#not-tag

# #card Note 2

## n2 h2

# #card Note 3 _#not-tag_

# #card Note 4 **#not-tag**

# #card Note 5 `#not-tag`

# #tag-in-header #card ignored

`#card` must be the first tag.
